email_body: Hey freak: So we finally had LA type weather here for the past two days. Highs in the mid-70's. Beautiful. Life's just cruising along. Nothing new. I put a bid in for a condo in a new mid-rise building going up in West U that they accepted. If all goes as expected I'll move in next X-Mas. So are you adjusting to the big city. Got yourself a big Hollywood actor boyfriend yet? John
